ShirtDesign

Intro

Design the PT shirt!

The winner(s) will get a shirt without additional costs aside from your time designing the shirt.

Don't forget we have both a front and a back side.

The shirts can be custom made so adding a personal touch for every member is allowed!

The designs may include M rated content and may contain humor!

How to apply

Just add your stuff below and don't forget to sign it with four tildes (~ ~ ~ ~) like so: CyaNox 23:43, 25 October 2007 (CEST)
